sect1.title: Installation with PEAR Package
sect1.para: Please download S2Container-version.tgz and do "pear install".
sect1.programlisting:
% pear install /path/to/S2Container-version.tgz install ok: channel://pear.php.net/S2Container-version
% pear list . . . S2Container version state . . . %
sect1.para: By requiring "S2Container.php", S2Container.PHP will be available.
Please carry out "pear uninstall", when you uninstall S2Container.PHP.

sect1.title: Installation with Full Package
sect1.para: Please download s2container.php-version.tar.gz and unpack it. The following directory will be created.
sect1.programlisting: s2container.php/ +-- classes/ +-- example/ +-- sbin/ +-- test/ +-- Apache_Software_License_2.0.txt +-- S2Container.php +-- S2ContainerCore.php
sect1.para: Please require "S2Container.php", then it becomes usable.

sect1.title: Installation with Phar Package
sect1.para: Please download S2Container-version.phar.gz and gunzip it. By requiring phar file, S2Container.PHP will be available.
